frontmatter.title: Academic writing on steroids
frontmatter.description: my course on advanced writing digital tools and a website for it

projectData.task: To develop and launch a profitable course on academic writing for Russian audience with minimal expenses
projectData.whyExists: Through the 3 years of my PhD studies, I have had issues with systematizing the literature I've read and putting it into the context. I researched the topic and gradually developed a system which works for me. After a year of preliminary research with problem interviews, questionnaires among my students and colleagues alike, I developed a course and decided to design and develop a converting page as well

process.title: Taking the course
process.caption: I wanted to firmly learn React and as a person who professionally produces programming courses opted for Scrimba's course

process.title: Struggling
process.caption: I spent 2 weeks trying to make it work. Somtimes it was so unbearable that I needed to calm down (not really, but still true)

process.title: Designing
process.caption: I decided to make it minimally appealing, user-facing and fun and learned to use SVG animations

projectData.results: Learned React to some extent (I hope).
